V.ALRT information Application version : VSN Mobil was created with a clear goal – to bring a refreshing approach to the consumer electronics space and deliver devices that meet real needs for the real world. VSN Mobil’s leadership has over 200 global patents to its credit and additional patents pending. For More information visit us at
Manage Device No devices found. Currently you have no paired devices. Step 2 - Choose a V.ALRT Step 1 – Activate your V.ALRT Press and hold your V.ALRT for 10 seconds until you hear a beep and the light flashes green, then release the button. Please forget existing device to connect new V.ALRT.
My Device Find V.ALRT Rename V.ALRT Forget Me Fall Detection Disconnected Add contact Save Cancel OK Enter a valid phone number\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020 Forget this device? Device name changed successfully Unable to change name Enable Fall Detection? Disable Fall Detection? Fall detection accuracy depends on the nature and impact of the fall. Tests have shown that fall detection works better if V.ALRT is used with the Clip or Pendant. For best results always press the alert button for 2~8 seconds. Proceed enabling fall detection? Fall Detection No Yes Please wait a moment and try again
Fall Detected\u0020! \u0020\u0020Seconds…
Done\u0020 Congratulations!!! Your V.ALRT is set up! Before you continue we recommend that you perform a test to ensure proper operation. Please notify your contacts that they will be receiving a text/phone call before pressing the alert button on your V.ALRT. To activate the alert simply press the button for 2 seconds and then release it, your contacts will be notified in few seconds!!!

From V.ALRT Notification V.ALRT Fall \u0020location to follow;\u0020 My estimated location is Additional requirements for the use and proper functionality of V.ALRT: V.ALRT Device Model Number: VSN 400 Alert message should not be empty 10 seconds
Take the tour\u0020 Setup my device Buy on vsnmobil.com
Help is just a button press away V.ALRT is a wearable device able to send out urgent calls and text messages at the touch of a button. Its fall detection will give you further peace of mind.
Everywhere you are Using a V.ALRT is very simple which makes it the perfect device for all ages. Waterproof protection allows you to use it almost anywhere!!!
V.ALRT is there Children are our most prized treasure and although we would like to protect them 24/7, it\'s just not possible. Luckily the V.ALRT can. Peace of mind There are times we find ourselves in unfamiliar surroundings. However, with a V.ALRT you are never alone. With a press of the button, help can be called in quietly and discreetly. How it works Press play above to learn how the V.ALRT works.

Skip\u0020 Panic Sound You may choose for the V.ALRT or the Phone not to provide any sound or visual notification. Advanced Settings Advanced Warning, when you change the country it is necessary to select contacts from the new country.
Please make sure your contact’s number uses the proper international dialing format The number should start with a + sign followed by country code. The country code for Mexico is +52, Brazil is +55, Spain is +34, Columbia is +57 and India is +91 Edit Number Number format is incorrect +
Select a Country Country
ON OFF Turn OFF V.ALRT Turned On V.ALRT Turned OFF Turning V.ALRT off will disable the device and you will not be able to trigger an alert until you turn this back on.
Tell your contacts that they are part of your V.ALRT circle. \u0022I added you as a V.ALRT contact. If I need help you will get a call and/or an SMS with my location.\u0022 I added you as a V.ALRT contact. If I need help you will get a call and/or an SMS with my location. Send Sending SMS
Tracker Enable alerts for when your V.ALRT goes out of range In Tracker mode your phone will vibrate or play a unique loud alert sound, when your V.ALRT goes out of range. Please ensure your phone is not in silent mode. Loud Tone Vibrate On Off Tracker In Progress Tracker Canceled Tracker Loud Alert will be turned off. Silent Mode for your phone application will be turned off. Accept Share Network Failure Alert Completed! Alert Call Failed
